ctaCard.title: Explore computer science with me!
ctaCard.description: Explore all you can do with me! I am a computer science student 💻 at the University of Stanford 🇺🇸. I love to explore the world of computer science and I am here to share my knowledge with you 🫡 !

footer.description: AI, mathematics, web... everything is in this blog
